Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/115th
ShortDescription: Southbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Southbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Francisco. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Francisco.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
